All transactions are fictitious. You\'re not dealing with real cryptocurrencies
Required fields are not filled out
What would you like to do?
and observe the value of your portfolio
This currency is not supported yet.
Please select a currency for the limit
Please choose a name for your new profile
Rate this app on the Play Store
Please rate this app to support further development
Support the development of new features
You have to own something before you can sell.
What do you want to do?
Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
A selected profile can\'t be deleted
Will work in the next update!
You can set a custom date for the transaction or use the current time
The custom date can\'t lie behin the last transaction which is: %s
Do you really want to remove this transaction?
You can\'t undo this action. If you delete this transaction, the previous transaction for this currency will become deletable
